title: Eliminating x
text: Multiply the first equation by -3 and add the result to the second equation. This gives us $$-5y-4z=-17$$. Now, multiply thee first equation by -1 and add to the third equation to get $$5y+4z=17$$. Add these two equations together to get $$0=0$$. This system is dependent.

title: Finding a Solution in terms of Z
text: Solve for y in the equation $$5y+4z-17$$ to get $$y=\frac{-4}{5} t+\frac{17}{5}$$. Substitute this into the first equation to find x. $$x+\left(-\frac{4}{5} z+\frac{17}{5}\right)+z=7, x=\frac{-1}{5} z+\frac{18}{5}$$. The solution is (-1/5z+18/5,-4/5z+17/5,z)
